1.name: The Colt
1.description: Any demon that gets hit by one of your 13 bullets will die! _Increases the chance of success when hunting demons_

2.name: Giant Cage
2.description: A huge cage made especially to trap giants! _Increases the chance of success when hunting giants_

3.name: Edge of Cain
3.description: The first blade made for hunting angels! _Increases the chance of success when hunting angels_

4.name: Silver Blade
4.description: A double-edged blade specializing in the killing of Archangels! _Increases the chance of success when hunting archangels_

5.name: Necare Hêmítheos
5.description: Physical weapons are not always effective, for the demigods it takes Greco-Latin runes to bring them down! _Increases the chance of success when hunting demigods_

6.name: Deicide
6.description: The knowledge to kill a god can only be gained from external aids! _Increases the chance of success when hunting gods_

7.name: Demonic Accelerator
7.description: A machine that speeds up the time between hunting demons! _Decreases demon hunting cooldown_

8.name: Giant Hourglass
8.description: A huge hourglass capable of knowing the time when the giants will be in hunting dungeons! _Decreases giant hunting cooldown_

9.name: Heavenly Harp
9.description: Nothing better to attract angels than your own music! _Decreases angel hunting cooldown_

10.name: Trumpets of Heaven
10.description: The legend says that when blowing the trumpets of heaven, the archangels will descend to Earth for revenge! _Decreases archangel hunting cooldown_

11.name: Key to Camp Half Blood
11.description: A key to enter the camp of the demigods! _Decreases demigod hunting cooldown_

12.name: Head of Medusa
12.description: All Gods fear it, so they band together to try to eliminate it, bringing an abundance of Gods to the dungeon! _Decreases god hunting cooldown_
